laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial lactate of 6.5 with a subsequent decrease to 1.6 after 2L NS.
Creatinine of 1.4, considered abnormal as it is above the normal range (1.4 - 1.8).

The liver is diffusely echogenic, contour smooth, no suspicious mass. Anechoic avascular fluid collection near gallbladder fossa measures 2.4 x 1.4 x 3.1 cm, reduced from 3.8 x 1.8 cm on prior examination. No ascites. Cholelithiasis without gallbladder distention.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Fluid collection decreased in size from 3.8 x 1.8 cm to 2.4 x 1.4 x 3.1 cm.
